text:
A Bill to include certain castes, including Sais, Aheria and Peruvannan, in the list of Scheduled Castes (SC) in Chhattisgarh, Haryana, Kerala, Odisha and West Bengal was approved by the Lok Sabha on Tuesday.

Moving the Constitution (Scheduled Castes) Order, 1950, Amendment Bill, Social Justice Minister Thawar Chand Gehlot said, “The Bill proposes to include certain communities in the list and remove area restriction in respect of certain communities and exclude certain communities in the case of Odisha”. Several members suggested that the government should come up with a Reservation Act to ensure members of the Scheduled Castes get the benefit at the time of promotion. — PTI
title: Lok Sabha nod for inclusion of more castes in SC list
